title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: This bug report concerns an issue where the maximized state of the CVS repository view is not being preserved when switching perspectives.
OB: The observed behavior is not explicitly stated in the report, making it challenging to understand the exact problem or its impact.
EB: The expected behavior is that the CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching between perspectives. It should maintain its maximized state as it was originally set.
SR: To further investigate and address this issue, it's essential to provide clear and complete steps to reproduce the problem. This will aid in understanding and resolving the issue effectively.
